DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether increasing cardiac output by a combination of intravenous fluids and inotropic drugs can reduce mortality and morbidity in radical cystectomy operations.
DOC.brief_title: Advanced Hemodynamic Monitoring for Goal-directed Hemodynamic Management During Radical Cystectomy
DOC.criteria: Adults (>18yo) scheduled for elective radical cystectomy and ileal conduit formation Creatinine level above 200 mcg/dl single functioning kidney s/p kidney transplant heart rhythm other than sinus known allergy to lithium chloride chronic lithium therapy weight below 40 kg mental or language problems that precludes obtaining informed consent
